mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOX_H ( SEQ, POST_SEQ, LOCATION, ORI_NAME, SAVE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, DEL_GB ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOX.nextval, #{BOARD_IDX}, '1', #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, POST_SEQ, ORI_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM BOX_H WHERE POST_SEQ = #{IDX, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DEL_GB = '0'
SELECT SAVE_NAME, ORI_NAME FROM BOX_H WHERE POST_SEQ = #{IDX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOX_H SET DEL_GB = '1' WHERE POST_SEQ = #{IDX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
UPDATE BOX_H SET DEL_GB = '0' WHERE SEQ = #{FILE_IDX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
